summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the permit granted to The Boeing Company by Ordinance 109661, for the maintenance and operation of two tunnels under and across Sixteen Avenue South, Five Hundred Sixty-Five feet south of East Marginal Way South, and under and across East Marginal Way South, Five Hundred Ten feet east of Sixteen Avenue South, by renewing the permission granted therein for a period of ten (10) years; by amending Section 8 thereof to update insurance requirements; and by amending Section 11 thereof to establish the annual fee for the next five (5) years of the permit.
